products.name: Bondage Homme Body Spray 150ml
products.description: Bondage Homme Body Spray 150ml is a premium fragrance crafted for the modern man who values confidence and elegance. This body spray blends refreshing citrus top notes with a warm, spicy heart and deep woody undertones, creating a scent that is both invigorating and long-lasting. Its 150ml size makes it perfect for daily use, whether you are heading to the office, gym, or an evening out. The advanced formula not only delivers a captivating masculine aroma but also provides reliable odor protection, keeping you fresh and energetic throughout the day. Stylishly packaged and easy to carry, Bondage Homme Body Spray is the ideal choice for men who want to leave a lasting impression.

products.name: Bondage Extreme Body Spray 150ml
products.description: Bondage Extreme Body Spray 150ml is a bold and powerful fragrance designed for men who love intensity and strength. It opens with an energetic burst of fresh citrus and cool mint, blending seamlessly into spicy aromatic notes that create a daring character. The base settles into deep woody and musky undertones, giving the scent a rugged and long-lasting appeal. Its advanced formula ensures all-day freshness and reliable odor protection, making it perfect for active lifestyles and special occasions alike. With its sleek design and masculine aroma, Bondage Extreme Body Spray helps you stand out, exuding confidence and vitality wherever you go.
